title: Making Peanut Butter-Flavored Cocktails with Peanut Punch Recipe
full_text:
Making Peanut Butter-Flavored Cocktails with Peanut Punch Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
3
to 4 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1/2
cup
smooth peanut butter
2 1/2
cups
milk
1/3
cup
honey
or
simple syrup
1/2
teaspoon
ground cinnamon
1
teaspoon
ground dried ginger
1/2
teaspoon
grated
nutmeg
Directions
Put all of the ingredients a blender and mix on high speed until smooth. Serve chilled or over ice.
Non-Alcoholic Drinks
Peanut Butter
